```{r setup}

ll100lines <- read.table(file = "/DATA/usr/n.klaassen/projects/SuRE_K562/analyses/PhD_Analyses/20200507_LL100CellLines.txt"  ,  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
ll100lines$V1 <- sort(ll100lines$V1)
ll100lines
Nucleofectlines <- read.table(file ="/DATA/usr/n.klaassen/projects/SuRE_K562/analyses/PhD_Analyses/20200507_NucleofectorOptimizedCellLines.txt", fill = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
Nucleofectlines <- Nucleofectlines[order(Nucleofectlines$V1),]
Nucleofectlines$V1 <- toupper(Nucleofectlines$V1)

matches <- ll100lines[ll100lines$V1 %in% Nucleofectlines$V1,]
matches
```
